text:
RADIO STATION KUSD
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH DAKOTA
December 13, 1955
VERMILLION
690 KILOCYCLES
lOOO WATTS
TO; John Holt, Waldo Abbot
John Regnell, Hugh Kix
FROM: Jim Slack
SUBJECT; Patterns of Thought
It is a little difficult to cover some of these weighty
matters in 14:30, but I think Utah University deserves
credit for trying. The language tends to be a bit
esoteric but the format is generally quite appealing.
The Network should benefit from such a series. I vote
yes.
RECEIVED
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
LLb i G hno
A M
